detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Pool.claimAndUnstake(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pool__9.sol#116-124):
	External calls:
	- rewardToken.transfer(msg.sender,rewards) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pool__9.sol#121)
	- _withdraw(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pool__9.sol#123)
		- stakeToken.transfer(host,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pool__9.sol#151)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _withdraw(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pool__9.sol#123)
		- STAKED_AMOUNT[host] = STAKED_AMOUNT[host].sub(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pool__9.sol#148)
	- _withdraw(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pool__9.sol#123)
		- totalStaked = totalStaked.sub(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pool__9.sol#150)

detectors.description:
